channel.title: Docker en Youtube Dl on alecharp's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker en Youtube Dl on alecharp's blog

item.title: Get videos from Youtube with Docker
item.description: Last week I created my first docker image to be able to get videos from youtube without having to install anything on my computer. Youtube-dl For a year or two, I used youtube-dl to download any videos from the video platform in order to have a offline version of any videos I’d like to watch. This is very useful to watch them in public transport or when you have a bad internet connection.
